entry.title: How to use the Visual Studio Remote Debugger ?

link.title: How to use the Visual Studio Remote Debugger ?

entry.summary: Hi, there. Often, we need to debug an unstable application that can destroy our system and because so we use a virtual machine. For debugging on the VM or other remote pc, Microsoft developed remote debugging tools which supporting since Visual Studio 2012 and later. In this article, we talk about remote debugging with the visual studio. First, we should prepare the virtual machine that we wi...
